snippet.title: USC Counterforce - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1574870/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=ads&utm_campaign=announcement&utm_content=trailer
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/vsxD6n8P8J

USC: Counterforce is an epic revival of turn-based squad tactics inspired by XCOM, Space Hulk, and Aliens, coming to PC in Early Access in 2023. The game is developed by Angry Cat Studios and published by Firesquid.

Join the USC in defending humanity!

USC Counterforce socials
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1574870/USC_Counterforce
Website: https://usc.games
Twitter: https://twitter.com/USCtactics
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/USCTactics

Angry Cat Studios socials
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=Angry%20Cat%20Studios
Website: https://angrycatstudios.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AngryCatStudios
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/angrycatstudios

Firesquid socials
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/search/?publisher=Firesquid%20Games
Website: https://www.firesquid.fr
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FiresquidGames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FiresquidGames

-------------------------------------------------------

Trailer:
Media Lemon
https://www.Medialemon.tv

Voice actors:
Carlito Sanchez
https://www.fiverr.com/carlitosanchez?source=gig_page&gigs=slug%3Aprovide-an-elite-level-dramatic-voice-to-your-project%2Cpckg_id%3A1&ref=language%3Aenglish
Martin Pedersen
https://www.fiverr.com/v4/users/firesquid/orders/FO413B4F64B84?source=orders_navigator

Music:
Composed & performed by Thomas Bernardini
Produced by Nicolas Isnard & Thomas Bernardini

#alien #tactical #indiegame #horrorgaming #space #nostalgia #xcom #xcom2 #spacehulk
